page.title: 06HOLME FARM(1)
page.content: {Mr. Bosomworth's farm} This farm is a dairy farm it has 44 cows and they are fresians.They are thorough_bred fresians and you can tell they are thorough_bred because they have black legs,not black and white.Mr.Bosomworth has no bulls although he had 3 bulls at one time.One of the bulls was slaughtered as he was dangerous and since that time he has not replaced the bull.The cows give on average 25 litres of milk a day .The milking is not done by hand it is done by machinery.Clusters are put on the cow and these are connected by pipes to a sort of metal tank.In the tank the milk is kept moving and is kept at the right temperature.This method of milking is called "pipe_line milking ".The milk_tanker arrives at about 11.00 am.
